channel.title: Satisfactory not launching correctly. Error
channel.description:
The game returns an error when trying to run with any mod installed.
"Plugin 'SML' failed to load because module 'SML' could not be found. Please ensure the plugin is properly installed, otherwise consider disabling the plugin for this project"
I have cleared the cache, reinstalled the application, reinstalled Satisfactory and updated to the latest version.

item.title: Satisfactory not launching correctly. Error
item.dc:creator: @Thomas_Fiedler Thomas Fiedler
item.description:
@Thomas_Fiedler wrote:

Plugin 'SML' failed to load because module 'SML' could not be found SML
Hi, i found way to solve the problem for me. After installing SMM and the mods i want, i get the same error message. CL151248 SML v3.0.0 Then i copied the SML binaries (*.dll, *.pdb) from …\Satisfactory\FactoryGame\Mods\SML\Binaries\Win64 To …\Satisfactory\FactoryGame\Binaries\Win64 After that i modified the file UE4-Win64-Shipping.modules and add the SML Modul “SML”: “UE4-SML-Win64-Shipping.dll” Cheers

Read full topic

item.title: Satisfactory not launching correctly. Error
item.dc:creator: @Chris_Waite Chris Waite
item.description:
@Chris_Waite wrote:

I had this issue and bizarrely I completely uninstalled SML and reinstalled it. Very weird because at first I must have been duped by the fact it says it updates automatically, yet when I put it back on everything was fine, although I had to redownload my mods.

Read full topic

item.title: Satisfactory not launching correctly. Error
item.dc:creator: @Aykut_Tasci Aykut Taşcı
item.description:
@Aykut_Tasci wrote:

Does not work if you try to install it manually. The SML had to be updated by the developer. They suggest running it with the installer.
